mapper.update: update grp_system_rel set SYSTEM_INFO_ID = #{systemInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DT = #{statusDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_DT = #{startDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DT = #{endDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID = #{offerVrulGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DT = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where GRP_SYSTEM_REL_ID = #{grpSystemRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select GRP_SYSTEM_REL_ID, SYSTEM_INFO_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DT, START_DT, END_DT, VERSION, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID, CREATE_DT, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from grp_system_rel where GRP_SYSTEM_REL_ID = #{grpSystemRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select GRP_SYSTEM_REL_ID, SYSTEM_INFO_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DT, START_DT, END_DT, VERSION, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID, CREATE_DT, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from grp_system_rel
